introduction.title: The Cryo-sleep Chamber
introduction.text: You awaken from cryo-sleep to the blaring of alarms. Your ship, the Odyssey, is adrift in uncharted space. The main computer is offline, and you are the only one awake.

bridge.title: The Silent Bridge
bridge.text: The bridge is dark and silent. The viewscreen shows a field of asteroids. You are on a collision course.

choices.text: Try to manually pilot the ship.

engine_room.title: The Humming Core
engine_room.text: The engine room is filled with the hum of the ship's core. The power is fluctuating, and you can see sparks flying from a nearby console.

restore_power.title: A Glimmer of Hope
restore_power.text: You manage to restore power to the bridge. The main computer comes online, and you are able to divert the ship from its collision course.

manual_pilot.title: A Risky Maneuver
manual_pilot.text: You take the controls and try to pilot the ship through the asteroid field. It is a risky maneuver, but you are a skilled pilot.

stabilize_core.title: A Dangerous Task
stabilize_core.text: You manage to stabilize the core, but not before a power surge overloads the system. The ship is safe, but you are knocked unconscious.

reroute_power.title: A Spark of Genius
reroute_power.text: You reroute power to the bridge, and the main computer comes online. You are able to divert the ship from its collision course.

continue_journey.title: A New Beginning
continue_journey.text: You have saved the ship and its crew. You are a hero. You continue your journey, ready for whatever adventures await you.
